item.title: Charter Day
item.description: About Event Rotaract Bangalore Basaveshwaranagar officially chartered on 25th June 2019 and on this day we successfully complete 2️⃣ years in our Rotaract journey

item.title: Sow'em All
item.description: About Event Sow’em all was one of the interesting events that aimed at involving every member to see something grow and learn that everything is a process that needs constant attention by addition of efforts just like the pack of seeds needed to grow by sprouting and develop into a beautiful plant.
